video.title: Sabrina, The Animated Series
video.synopsis: Sabrina lives with a big secret: She's half mortal and half witch! Only her two aunts, her best friend and her cat know her true identity.

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina and Chloe try to compete with Gem by fitting into the latest fad jeans.
episodes.title: Shrink to Fit

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina makes a dream bike for Harvey so he can beat the bully Slugloaf.
episodes.title: Boy Meets Bike

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina tries to win a spot on the cheerleading squad before Gem. Her only requirement: She must impress the snobby cheerleaders all week long.
episodes.title: The Importance of Being Norma

episodes.synopsis: Salem eats Sabrina's prize mouse for her science fair. After much blackmailing on Sabrina's part, she gets Salem to morph into a mouse in its place.
episodes.title: You Said a Mouse-ful

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina is psyched about the school dance and can't understand why Harvey doesn't want to go.
episodes.title: Boogie Shoes

episodes.synopsis: Sick of her seemingly mediocre existence, Sabrina decides the grass must be greener on the other side. She casts a spell to trade her life for Gem's.
episodes.title: The Witch Switch

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina is tired of the restrictions that come with being a kid. She casts a spell that catapults her into adulthood.
episodes.title: Anywhere But Here

episodes.synopsis: After being dissed from Gem's Halloween party, Sabrina throws a Halloween party of her own.
episodes.title: Nothin' Says Lovin' like Somethin' from a Coven

episodes.synopsis: Everyone is fed up with Sabrina and Gem's constant rivalry. Sabrina casts a spell to make Gem and herself closer.
episodes.title: I've Got Glue Babe

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina competes with Gem for class president. They play dirty, and Gem accuses her of being weird. Sabrina tries to prove her wrong.
episodes.title: Wag the Witch

episodes.synopsis: Tim the Witchsmeller is a disgruntled half-witch who can perform magic, so he comes to Greendale to trap some witches.
episodes.title: The Most Dangerous Witch

episodes.synopsis: The Student of the Year winner will be announced soon, and Sabrina and Gem are each trying to win.
episodes.title: Picture Perfect

episodes.synopsis: Uncle Quigley, sick of being unappreciated, runs away from home and leaves the family with a mean nanny.
episodes.title: Has Anybody Seen My Quigley

episodes.synopsis: Determined to make Harvey happy, Sabrina dabbles in the spooky jar to make him the raddest skateboarder since Tony Hawk.
episodes.title: Extreme Harvey

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina needs a little lesson in true love for her Shakespeare play, while Zelda just needs a date. They conjure up Romeo to teach them the ropes.
episodes.title: Stage Fright

episodes.synopsis: Harvey lacks the courage to show his comic book to comic creator King Kirby. Sabrina gives him a Wishing Star hoping that he'll wish for courage.
episodes.title: The Senses Shattering Adventures of Captain Harvtastic

episodes.synopsis: After ignoring an important household rule, Sabrina finds that she has caused Cinderella to appear in Greendale.
episodes.title: Once Upon a Whine

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina is desperate to earn money for an upcoming concert and baby-sits the terror twins.
episodes.title: Field Trippin

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina's band, the Flavor Babes, use a little magic to launch their careers.
episodes.title: Witchy Girls

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina is excited when her father drops in for a visit, but she's disappointed to learn that her father has brought along his fiancée.
episodes.title: My Stepmother the Babe

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina ends up in a new documentary series called "That Witch," which becomes an overnight sensation.
episodes.title: Documagicary

episodes.synopsis: When Sabrina hears that her grandparents are coming for visit, she is excited. They have a important announcement to make.
episodes.title: The Grand Parent Trap

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina uses a dash of mojo to win a baking contest against Gem.
episodes.title: Upside Down Town

episodes.synopsis: When Pi sees Sabrina's Uncle Zamboni flying through the air, he is convinced there are paranormal rumblings in Greendale.
episodes.title: Para-Normal Pi

episodes.synopsis: It's Salem's birthday, and he's used to getting lavish gifts. Sabrina thinks her homemade gift is bad, so she time travels to get him a unique gift.
episodes.title: This is Your Nine Lives

episodes.synopsis: Harvey mistakenly thanks Sabrina for saving his life. She feels bad for the unearned praise she is getting.
episodes.title: No Time to Be a Hero

episodes.synopsis: The Witches' Council has decreed that Sabrina must attend Witches' Boot Camp. She cannot get her full witch power until she attends and passes.
episodes.title: Absence of Malissa

episodes.synopsis: Salem falls for a fellow feline. He learns that she is a kitty-witch as well.
episodes.title: A Tail of Two Kitties

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina is excited to visit Uncle Quigley in his lab while taking a field trip to the observatory.
episodes.title: The Hex Files

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina befriends a stray dog named Alvin. She promises Uncle Quigley she will take the best possible care of her new friend.
episodes.title: Planet of the Dogs

episodes.synopsis: Harvey is scared about getting a vaccination. Sabrina makes him feel better by telling him it's no big deal -- until it's her time to get one.
episodes.title: Witchitis

episodes.synopsis: When Harvey can't make the wrestling team, Sabrina uses Dragon Spray to help him. The stuff actually works, making Harvey a star wrestler.
episodes.title: Harvzilla

episodes.synopsis: Gem's family has gone bankrupt and she's forced to stay with Sabrina. The fact that Gem is broke doesn't sink in and she bosses Sabrina around.
episodes.title: Stone Broke

episodes.synopsis: Uncle Quigley decides to reinstate Family Fun Night on Saturdays! Sabrina and the aunts think that Quigley is in serious need of a love life.
episodes.title: Saturday Night Furor

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina is disappointed at not being picked to go on a field trip by her favorite teacher. Salem steers her to the mysterious Wise Warlock.
episodes.title: What Becomes of the Broken Hearted?

episodes.synopsis: Gem hosts two exchange students to be cool. Instead of the real exchange students, Dawson and Felicity show up.
episodes.title: Hex Change Students

episodes.synopsis: Harvey becomes obsessed with Devin Degaulle, a new martial arts action hero. Sabrina feels slighted that Harvey has nothing else on his mind.
episodes.title: Feats of Clay

episodes.synopsis: Salem's old warlock buddy Hephastus comes into town for a visit. Salem, embarrassed by his cat body, tries to disguise himself.
episodes.title: Salem's Plot

episodes.synopsis: Gem and Sabrina are teamed up to work on a book report. Since they can never agree on anything, they argue over who will start reading.
episodes.title: When in Rome

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina goes hog-wild at the Greendale Jr. High Extracurricular Activities Fair and boasts that she can do it all!
episodes.title: Send in the Clones

episodes.synopsis: Boogey Jr. (son of the legendary Boogeyman) pays a visit to Sabrina and Salem.
episodes.title: Scare Apparent

episodes.synopsis: When it seems like Hilda isn't going to pass a test for her mortal driver's license, Sabrina conjures up a cute driving instructor to help her.
episodes.title: Driver Ed

episodes.synopsis: It's time for Sabrina's wisdom teeth to come out. She doesn't want to experience it the mortal way, so she opts to have them removed magically.
episodes.title: Molar Molar

episodes.synopsis: Harvey's favorite show, "Billy-Go-Boom-Boom," has been canceled. He begins to freak out because everything is changing.
episodes.title: You've Got a Friend

episodes.synopsis: Enchantra comes to town for her annual witch evaluation test and finds Sabrina's progress unsatisfactory.
episodes.title: The Generation Zap

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina's baseball team is on a major losing streak, and Gem is there to point it out. Sabrina conjures up the perfect team.
episodes.title: Field of Screams

episodes.synopsis: Hilda is not pleased when her old vampire buddies, the Bat Pack, swoop into town for a visit. But Sabrina is dazzled by their charming ways.
episodes.title: The Bat Pack

episodes.synopsis: It's summer vacation, and Hilda wants the gang to go on an adventure tour in the Netherworld.
episodes.title: Enchanted Vacation

episodes.synopsis: The Spellmans' great-great-great-grandpa Gandolf comes to Greendale for a visit and to renew his witching license.
episodes.title: Moldy Oldie

episodes.synopsis: After Sabrina gets a bad haircut, she is ashamed to be seen. She convinces Chloe and Harvey to go to the movies with her so she can hide.
episodes.title: Witchery Science Theatre

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina is on the fast track to losing the science fair. She decides to get a little help ... by conjuring up a young Thomas Edison.
episodes.title: Strange New World

episodes.synopsis: Harvey is recruited to test a prototype of a new virtual reality game. Unbeknownst to him, the video executive made the game addictive!
episodes.title: Xabrina Warrior Witch

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina needs help on a Netherworld term paper, so she sneaks into Zelda's possessions to look at a journal written by the famous wizard Merlin.
episodes.title: Hexcalibur

episodes.synopsis: While visiting France, Sabrina causes a major uproar when she accidentally changes the Eiffel Tower into a person.
episodes.title: Straight Outta Paris

episodes.synopsis: When the Spellmans take a trip to the mountains, Hilda and Zelda go skiing, Quigley goes ice skating, and Sabrina and Harvey go snowboarding.
episodes.title: Board & Sorcery

episodes.synopsis: To make Harvey happy, Sabrina uses her magic to conjure up an advance copy of the latest spy flick.
episodes.title: La Femme Sabrina

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina has abused her magic one too many times. When Quigley warns her of the consequences, Sabrina swears off magic altogether.
episodes.title: Brina Baby

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina has a crush on Dave, her new piano instructor, and she's devastated when she learns that he already has a lady in his life.
episodes.title: Key to My Heart

episodes.synopsis: It's Christmas time and Gem's selfish antics are driving everyone mad, so Sabrina and her family conspire to show her the error of her ways.
episodes.title: A Witchmas Carole

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina is determined to be the best swimmer in order to get Harvey's attention back from another swimming beauty.
episodes.title: Fish Schtick

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina is on a quest to raise money for the library fund.
episodes.title: Generation Hex

episodes.synopsis: When Sabrina and her classmates go on a camping adventure with Sabrina's Uncle Quigley acting as chaperone, Gem dares Sabrina to play a prank on him.
episodes.title: Truth or Scare

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina's class heads to Monument Island, where an important statue is kept.
episodes.title: Witchwrecked

episodes.synopsis: Hilda and Zelda want a car and need some cash fast -- so Quigley explains that they need to get jobs.
episodes.title: Working Witches

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina is just sick of the winter weather. She, Chloe and Salem would give anything for one hour at the beach.
episodes.title: Wiccan of the Sea
